name: Shinobi Stronghold
description:
Controls:

A and D (or Control Stick on controlller): Move left and right

Left Arrow/ X button (Xbox)/ Square(Playstation):  Water Attack

Up Arrow/ Y button (Xbox)/ Triangle (Playstation): Fire Attack

Right Arrow/ B button (Xbox)/ Circle (Playstation): Wood Attack

Down Arrow/ A button (Xbox)/ X(Playstation): Wind Attack (When meter is full)

Space (With A or D)/ Trigger (controller): Dash Attack left and right

Concept and Testing done by:

Cam Kerkau

https://twitter.com/CamKerkau

Second effects from:

https://opengameart.org/content/3-background-crash-explosion-bang-sounds

https://opengameart.org/content/4-projectile-launches

https://opengameart.org/content/magic-smite

https://freesound.org/people/Leszek_Szary/sounds/172206/

https://caffinate.itch.io/fibberish
